entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS I remember Dotard Trump promising to MAGA. But instead Dotard Trump has killed over 100,000 Americans due to his neglect, selfishness, and failure to recognize the seriousness of COVID-19 and failed to listen to everyone who constantly told him how serious the pandemic would be.
